X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

1st, currently, I have developed scenarios ranging from #116 top #136. 
 I have not completed my series, yet.

2nd, a while back, there was a message posted about who had what 
scenario numbers claimed.  In that message, I did claim all unclaimed 
scenario numbers up to 200.  Even though I have only stopped at 136, I 
still have a ways to go.  I want at least three future scenarios for 
most character classes plus 6 more scenarios [Reminder: my series is 
about a training grounds and it would reasonable to have specialized 
areas for each type of character.].  Then I have to do an ending to 
the series, which will be about 2-4 scenarios.  Of course, the last 
scenario will be somehow familiar.

3rd, the only other viable option for maintaining a list of what 
scenario numbers is a table in the database feature.  Only one problem 
with that, though.  How would anyone new in this egroup know to look 
in the database for a list of claimed scenario numbers?  

My suggestion would be for the moderators to put some message on the 
front door of this group about how to find out what scenario numbers 
are claimed.  

Beyond that, someone probably needs to repost a message every once in 
a while (as soon as the old message about what scenario numbers are 
claimed gets out of sight) explaining which scenario numbers are 
taken.  That is about all any of us can do to prevent such overlaps in 
the future.
